# Scripts

Bundled resources for error-rate-monitor skill

- [x] analyze_errors.py: Script to fetch error data from various sources (logs, APIs) and calculate error rates.
- [x] set_alert_threshold.py: Script to set alert thresholds for error rates based on user input.
- [x] generate_error_report.py: Script to generate a detailed error report in a user-friendly format (e.g., Markdown, HTML).
